objects.text:
• Same-City Furniture Shipping
• Affordable Rates for Businesses
• Reliable & Secure Transport
• Ship Smarter in Your City

product_details.name: Quick by Shiprocket
product_details.description: The intent of the ad banner is to highlight the fact that Shiprocket can service furniture in hyperlocal markets. We have a product called Quick, which helps small businesses send their good in the same city to their consumers ast the lowest prices.

banner_details:
This banner promotes a local furniture delivery service and features a modern, clean layout with bold typographic hierarchy. The banner contains three primary text layers: a vibrant header ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in contrasting purple and black hues that capture attention, a green-highlighted subheading ("tagline") emphasizing speed and brand identity, and a bulleted list ("description") outlining key benefits. A large product image ("product_image") of a stylish chair dominates the right, adding visual appeal and relevance. A prominent purple price tag ("price") is placed at the bottom left, followed by a bright green rectangular CTA button ("cta_button") with white text ("cta"). Decorative lines and frames subtly embellish the layout.

Color palette:
- Deep Purple (#442378)
- Bright Neon Green (#12F040)
- Black (#181818)
- Soft White (#F7F9FB)
- Light Gray Overlay (#F4F4F6)
product_color: The product image features a modern teal armchair with gold metal legs, paired with a minimalist white and gold side table. The dominant color is a rich teal blue (#0F4C5C), which evokes depth and sophistication. The metallic gold legs (#Bfa14b) add a touch of luxury, creating a striking contrast against the deep tones of the chair. The marble-white tabletop (#F7F7F7) and soft gray fabric (#AEA9A6) introduce a subtle balance, softening the visual impact while enhancing elegance. The green from the plant (#89B76E) adds a lively, fresh element. These colors blend intuitively, highlighting each shade while supporting an upscale, cozy ambiance.
